Title: Reps to debate motion seeking medical intervention for Nnamdi Kanu
Summary: Reps to debate motion seeking medical intervention for Mazi Nnamdi Kanu . House of Representatives will this week debate a motion seeking urgent medical intervention . Kanu is detained leader of the proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB)

Title: LASTMA arrests fake officer for extorting motorist in Lagos
Summary: Lagos State Traffic Management Authority (LASTMA) has apprehended a 47-year-old man, identified as Mr Adetayo Adewodun, for impersonating a LASTMA officer and extorting ₦7,800 from a motorist around the Itire Junction area of Lagos .

Title: Why Nigerians need judicial clarification on emergency rule — Ex-Rep Dagogo
Summary: Former House of Representatives member, Farah Dagogo, insists there is still a compelling need for judicial clarification on the constitutional issues raised by the President’s action . Dagogo insists that despite the lifting of the emergency rule in Rivers State, there is a need for clarification .

Title: Emir Sanusi hails FG over tax reforms, CBN’s monetary policy
Summary: Emir Muhammadu Sanusi II expressed pleasure with what the apex bank has done as far as monetary policy is concerned and the tax reforms . Former Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) and the current Emir of Kano has expressed pleasure .

Title: My resignation not admission of guilt, says Nnaji
Summary: Former Minister of Innovation, Science and Technology, Uche Nnaji, says his resignation is not admission of guilt . He resigned following allegations of certificate forgery . An investigative report was published by an investigative report .

Title: Alleged terrorism: NMA panel report stalls Nnamdi Kanu’s trial
Summary: The NMA committee, the court said, should comprise eight to 10 medical practitioners . The committee should include a Cardiologist and Neurologist, among whom should be a Neurologist .

Title: INTERPOL nabs Nigerian in Argentina over multiple romance scams
Summary: Interpol said the Nigerian was accused of ‘leading an international cybercrime network’ Interpol disclosed that the Nigerian has been accused of leading an international crime network . The Nigerian was arrested in Argentina over multiple romance scams .

Title: Hamas says ‘optimism prevails’ in Gaza talks with Israel
Summary: Hamas says ‘optimism prevails’ in Gaza talks with Israel . Trump said the United States would do "everything possible to make sure everyone adheres to the deal"

Title: FG reassures on ongoing talks with ASUU, other unions
Summary: FG reassures on ongoing talks with ASUU, other unions . He recalled that in the past, different committees handled negotiations separately for universities, polytechnics, and colleges of education .

Title: Nnaji’s resignation shows Tinubu’s zero tolerance for corruption  —  APC Chieftain
Summary: APC Chieftain says Tinubu's tolerance for corruption is a demonstration of his intolerance for corruption . According to him, the resignation of Nnaji is a sign of his tolerance for real or perceived corruption .
